entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
